itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, March 6, 2015
contentencoded: First up on today's show, we'll talk about the strong jobs report for February. Plus, we'll talk about the marriage of personal values and investment portfolios when it comes to both index funds and other types of investments.
title: PODCAST: The jobs report for February
description: A strong jobs report for February, and the combining of personal values with investment portfolios.
